label: logicB:finance_en
steps: [1] If the central bank lowers the policy rate, commercial bank funding costs decrease.
[2] If commercial bank funding costs decrease, the bank expands loan supply.
[3] For any borrower x, if x’s debt-service coverage ratio (DSCR) exceeds 1.5, then x has low default risk.
[4] If the bank expands loan supply and borrower a has low default risk, then approve the loan to a.
[5] The central bank lowers the policy rate.
[7] The bank expands loan supply and borrower a has low default risk (from [1–3],[5],[6]).
[8] Approve the loan to a (from [4] and [7]).
